abstract: A top Citigroup banker in Europe is leaving the U.S. firm and is expected to take a senior position at Barclays’s investment bank, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: A top Citigroup banker in Europe is leaving the U.S. firm and is expected to take a senior position at Barclays’s investment bank, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: A top Citigroup banker in Europe is leaving the U.S. firm and is expected to take a senior position at Barclays‘s investment bank, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.

headline.main: Citigroup’s Tom King to Leave, Report Says
